content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 2, Manchester City 0.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 2, Manchester City 0.
Offside, Stoke City. Marco van Ginkel tries a through ball, but Marko Arnautovic is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Joselu (Stoke City).
Substitution, Stoke City. Jonathan Walters replaces Ibrahim Afellay.
Foul by Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City).
Glenn Whelan (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Bacary Sagna (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Joselu (Stoke City).
Attempt saved. Fabian Delph (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ryan Shawcross.
Attempt blocked. Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov.
Substitution, Stoke City. Marco van Ginkel replaces Xherdan Shaqiri.
Attempt missed. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Raheem Sterling with a through ball.
Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City).
Fernando went off injured after Manchester City had used all subs.

Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Glen Johnson.
Substitution, Stoke City. Joselu replaces Bojan.
Attempt saved. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Attempt missed. Fabian Delph (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Attempt saved. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marko Arnautovic.
Substitution, Manchester City. Jesús Navas replaces David Silva.

Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Erik Pieters.
Attempt missed. Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Attempt saved. Bojan (Stoke City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Geoff Cameron with a headed pass.
Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Foul by Wilfried Bony (Manchester City).
Glenn Whelan (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Second Half begins Stoke City 2, Manchester City 0.
